main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 20th November 1954 in Beaumont, Texas. The observation lasted 3-5 minutes and involved 4 or 5 objects with red and white lights in a trail, travelling in different directions.
interesting points: The report was from a civilian source, and the observation was categorized as ground-visual.
The objects were described as having red and white lights in a trail, with one light traveling alone and the others traveling in a group.
The course of the objects was reported as southwest to northeast, and their manner of observation was ground visual.
The objects were observed at various altitudes, with no specific conclusion about their nature provided in the report.
The preparing officer of the report concluded that the objects were unknown.
sighted object: Four or five objects with red and white lights
